item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:130 Chances: Oracle Corp. has been recognized as a Leader in the 2023 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud Database Management Systems, showcasing its strong position in the cloud database market. The company’s introduction of new capabilities to Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Performance Management, in partnership with Deloitte, demonstrates its commitment to innovation and addressing evolving tax requirements for multinational organizations.
